A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I feel like I took a venture into a weird nerdy 8-year-olds’ insane imagination. I wanted to see Star Wars and ended up getting politics. I had to use the restroom during the middle of the movie and I didn’t even care. My family and I went on and on about how awful it was. The new Star Wars is a joke that isn’t funny. Star Wars is over.
